home.heroSubtitle: The average Indonesian lives for {years} years.
home.heroQuestion1: How many days have you spent? How many remain?
home.heroQuestion2: What will you do with your remaining time?
home.setupSubtitle: No lengthy assessment needed. Enter your basic data and see your countdown immediately.
home.researchSubtitle: These numbers are based on official data from the Indonesian Central Statistics Agency (BPS) and global health research.
home.topCausesTitle: Top Causes of Death in Indonesia
home.featureCountdownDesc: See your remaining time in days, hours, minutes, and seconds in real-time.
home.featureGoalsDesc: Create and manage your life goals by category: career, family, health, and more.
home.featureResearchDesc: All calculations based on BPS data and global health research.
home.footerDisclaimer: MindfulDeath is an awareness tool to help plan a more meaningful life. Calculations are based on average data and are not individual medical predictions.
home.footerSource: Data sources: Indonesian BPS 2023, WHO Global Health Observatory

dashboard.noGoalsDesc: Start by adding what you want to achieve before time runs out.
dashboard.infoDescription: Information about the data used in calculations
dashboard.disclaimer: This calculation is an estimate based on statistical averages and is not an individual medical prediction. Actual life expectancy may vary based on many factors.

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteConfirmDesc: This action cannot be undone. All data including goals will be permanently deleted.

research.title: Indonesian Life Expectancy
research.subtitle: All data based on official research and statistics from the Indonesian Central Statistics Agency (BPS) and WHO Global Health Observatory.
research.overviewDesc: Life Expectancy is the average estimate of how many years a person can live. Indonesia's life expectancy continues to increase year over year.
research.factWomenLonger: Women live an average of {years} years longer than men
research.factBelowGlobal: Indonesia's life expectancy is still below the global average (73.4 years)
research.factNCD: Non-communicable diseases (NCDs) are the main cause of death
research.lifestyleFactorsDesc: The following factors can affect life expectancy based on various studies:
research.disclaimerText: All data and calculations in MindfulDeath are estimates based on statistical averages and scientific research. This is not an individual medical prediction. Actual life expectancy may vary based on many factors including genetics, lifestyle, healthcare access, and environmental conditions.
research.needHelpDesc: If you're experiencing difficult thoughts, don't hesitate to contact:
